snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 2 DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
The war for Gallia is here! Take part in 22 all-new missions in one of the best DLC value bundles we've ever released - now available for Valkyria Chronicles 2! 

It's rare that western gamers will get a much better deal than their Japanese counterparts, but as a thank you for all the support from fans for the series here, we've bundled all 22 missions into a single $4.99 DLC pack. (For comparison, each mission was about $1 individually in Japan.)

From fun missions for moderate players to super-challenging missions for the hardcore fan who has conquered everything else, this DLC pack is perfect for any fan of the game - no matter how much you've played.

Also, though the video will show this - we really like explosions.

KRA-BOOM!
